name: Asset approved scrapped
script:
# When Asset Disposal is submitted and Status is Approved, update Asset Status to Scrapped
if doc.status == "Approved" and doc.asset_id:
    frappe.db.set_value("Asset", doc.asset_id, "status", "Scrapped")
    frappe.msgprint(f"Asset {doc.asset_id} has been marked as Scrapped.")
